color_help_text.message: Right-click the main or palette color buttons to select a custom color. Alternatively, you can use the Tab key to navigate to the main or palette color buttons, then press Ctrl/Shift/Alt + Enter to choose a custom color.

rate_link_text.message: ‚≠êÔ∏è Enjoying this extension? Please rate it!

help_translating_link_text.message: üàØ Help translate this extension into your language

offer_tinkoff_black_text.message: Sign up for a Tinkoff Black card using @this link@ and receive 500 rubles.

offer_tinkoff_investments_brokerage_acco.message: Open a brokerage account with Tinkoff Investments using @this link@ and get a share of up to 20,000 rubles.

offer_keymeleon_text.message: Download the @Keymeleon@ AutoHotkey script to switch keyboard layouts instantly with dedicated hotkeys, hear unique sounds for each layout switch and for typing on each layout, or automate everything with intelligent app-aware layout switching and context-sensitive hotkeys.

offer_clear_new_tab_text.message: Install the @Clear New Tab@ extension to remove everything from the new tab page while keeping your theme background, or use any image, GIF, or video as a custom wallpaper.

offer_empty_new_tab_page_text.message: Install the @Empty New Tab Page@ extension to replace the default new tab page with a blank page while keeping the default favicon. Supports dark mode.

offer_search_enhancer_for_google_text.message: Install the @Search Enhancer for Google‚Ñ¢@ extension to enhance Google‚Ñ¢ search with infinite scroll, server country icons, "View Image" and "Download Image" buttons, and more.

offer_scroll_to_top_text.message: Install the @Scroll to Top@ extension to scroll to the top or bottom of any page with a click on the left border of the screen, and then return to your previous position.

offer_close_other_tabs_plus_text.message: Install the @Close Other Tabs+@ extension to close/pin/unpin/group/ungroup multiple tabs at once, filtering them by a window, pin/group state, or URL.

offer_advanced_extension_reloader_text.message: Install the @Advanced Extension Reloader@ extension to reload an unpacked extension with one click, a hotkey, or automatically (extension for developers).

backup_permissions_start_notification.message: The extension has detected the following permission in your backup:

backup_permissions_end_notification.message: . Please navigate to the "Permissions" section and enable all required permissions to ensure the extension functions correctly.

invalid_file_type_back_up_error.message: Invalid file type. Upload the previously downloaded JSON backup file.

unable_to_access_settings_error.message: Fatal error: Unable to access settings. Please try to re-enable or reinstall the extension.

permissions_are_missing_error.message: The necessary permissions are missing to use this feature. Please navigate to the "Permissions" section and enable all required permissions.
